menu.name: Italian Prosciutto Pizza
menu.description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, prosciutto and fresh basil.

menu.description: Rustic Scottish dish made with sheep's offal, oats, and spices.

menu.name: American Cheeseburger
menu.description: Juicy beef patty with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.

menu.name: Japanese Spicy Ramen
menu.description: Rich miso broth with noodles, chili oil, pork slices, and a soft-boiled egg.

menu.name: Icelandic Plokkfiskur
menu.description: Creamy mash of fresh cod, potatoes, and onions.

menu.name: Ethiopian Misir Wat (Vegan)
menu.description: Spicy red lentil stew simmered with berbere and garlic.

menu.description: Crispy fried chicken coated in sweet, spicy gochujang sauce.

menu.name: Georgian Khinkali
menu.description: Juicy dumplings filled with spiced meat, eaten by hand with a sip of broth.

menu.name: Nuka Cola
menu.description: A sparkling beverage made to stand the test of time, and maybe even the apocalypse.

menu.name: Smokehead Whiskey

menu.name: Passion Delight
menu.description: A drink based on the passion fruit, with a hint of tropical sweetness.
